page.title: 13SOCIAL SURVEY
page.content: To find the views on life in the area a questionnaire was compiled. Of all those interviewed 67% liked living in the area.When asked why they they liked living in the area so much they all stated that they liked the quiet and beautiful surroundings. However 33% interviewed(all were under 16) said they disliked living in the area because there was nothing to do in their spare time,except watching T.V. There was a local youth club but they were not too enthusiastic about its activities. 65% over 16 years said they had their own transport(cars).Those without cars (45%) thought that the local bus service was very poor ,with only one bus service to Longton a day.They said they would use a more frequent service if there was a wider choice of destination.
